jcr:content.jcr:title: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom for mobile
jcr:content.browserTitle: Edit, Organize & Share Photos for iOS, Android | Adobe Lightroom for Mobile
jcr:content.metaDescription: Edit, organize, and enhance photos on your smartphone or tablet with Adobe Photoshop Lightroom for mobile. Get Photoshop CC plus Lightroom for desktop and mobile for US$9.99/month.

text_3da3.text:
Your photography is going places.
Craft and share pro-quality images from your smartphone or tablet using simple yet powerful tools built with Adobe Photoshop technology. Perfect your shots in a tap with more than 40 presets. Experiment with color, adjust clarity, and add vignettes. You can even connect to other Adobe apps like Photoshop Fix to retouch and refine your work.
See how it works ›

text_6363.text: For iPhone

text_78d2.text: For iPad and iPad Pro

text_145e.text:
Love photography? Get the Creative Cloud Photography plan.
Get the most out of Lightroom with the Adobe Creative Cloud Photography plan, which includes Lightroom for desktop, mobile, and web plus the latest version of Photoshop CC. All for just US$9.99/month. 
 
Find out what you can do. Try it ›

text_68f9.text:
Access your photos anywhere
Organize, edit, and share photos on your phone, tablet, desktop, or the web. Your edits automatically update on every device so your best shots are always at your fingertips.

text_b997.text:
Transform your photos
Combine multiple images, remove objects, and retouch with the power of Photoshop CC.

text_4fd4.text:
Refine with desktop tools
Use Lightroom on your desktop to precisely control color and tone, make adjustments to specific areas, correct perspective, and more.

text_c99.text:
Sync seamlessly
Lightroom for mobile supports virtually any image file format so you can sync your smartphone photo edits, raw image metadata, and much more across all your devices.

text_3a4a.text:
Showcase your work online
Share your photo collections in beautiful Lightroom web galleries and get feedback from family and friends, or post to your favorite social sites like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.

text_bbac.text:
Create visual stories
With direct access to Adobe Spark Page and Spark Video, you can easily turn photos into rich visual stories and animated videos.

text_a7d6.text:
Learn & Support
Learn Lightroom with our easy-to-follow tutorials, or find answers in the forums and FAQ.

text_7db1.text: Get started

text_107f.text: Common questions

text_3eac.text: Ask the community

text_22c6.text: Download the app today.
